title: ChiBitCTy
author: ChiBitCTy
content: Any Stern fans here? Looking to try and find one of these physical Beetcoins! I guess people who purchased beetcoin on this site were sent one (or some people were at least) - https://rally.io/creator/BEET/I’m a fan of the Stern show and a huge fan of Beetlejuice, so I would love to be able to find one of these. If you’re not familiar with Stern or Beetlejuice, here’s some video clips of them- https://youtu.be/Wuvp8gnFs4ohttps://youtu.be/EnuwukJwbqM

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: ChiBitCTy on September 16, 2022, 06:01:39 PMAny Stern fans here? Looking to try and find one of these physical Beetcoins! I was a Howard Stern fan pre-Sirius Satellite Radio.  I will admit it's probably been 15 years since I've listened to his show.  He was super funny back in the day though.I didn't know Beetcoins existed or that Beetlejuice had his own coin.  I may have to look into it for the lolz.  Thanks for sharing.  I wonder how many other awesome creations are out there that I have no idea about...

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on September 16, 2022, 07:02:36 PMI was a Howard Stern fan pre-Sirius Satellite Radio.  I will admit it's probably been 15 years since I've listened to his show.  He was super funny back in the day though.I didn't know Beetcoins existed or that Beetlejuice had his own coin.  I may have to look into it for the lolz.  Thanks for sharing.  I wonder how many other awesome creations are out there that I have no idea about...Ha, same here... Good times with Howard & Robin back in the early days was pretty damn cool. Chib, you continue to find the coolest/weirdest stuff, congrats yet againPersonally, I think you should PM @theymos for a custom Title like "Coin Treasure Finder" or something cool! cheers and gl with the search!

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on September 17, 2022, 01:07:44 AMQuote from: OgNasty on September 16, 2022, 07:02:36 PMI was a Howard Stern fan pre-Sirius Satellite Radio.  I will admit it's probably been 15 years since I've listened to his show.  He was super funny back in the day though.I didn't know Beetcoins existed or that Beetlejuice had his own coin.  I may have to look into it for the lolz.  Thanks for sharing.  I wonder how many other awesome creations are out there that I have no idea about...Ha, same here... Good times with Howard & Robin back in the early days was pretty damn cool. Chib, you continue to find the coolest/weirdest stuff, congrats yet againPersonally, I think you should PM @theymos for a custom Title like "Coin Treasure Finder" or something cool! cheers and gl with the search!   It’s crazy to think Sterns show was the closest thing I could find to porn on regular cable TV as a young lad. I was in my early teens when I’d watch it back when his show was on the E channel. Crazy now as a grown man he’s still going.  I absolutely can’t stand Robin. Completely talentless as well as classless.  @OG- his show was definitely better back in the day. I think when Artie was fired is when it really started going downhill. It’s still decent at times, but it’s not what it was.  My favorite part of the show is Richard and Sal. I love those two morons so much. Obviously I’m a big fan of prank phone calls.@Owl- lol, that would be kinda fun if Theymos gave me something like that. Speaking of Theymos, what I hope he ends up reviving is making a forum coin like he proposed a couple years ago. Quote from: minerjones on September 17, 2022, 08:19:55 AMHave one available.Will PM youMulling it over. Will keep you posted shortly. Was trying to see if I could get a handful at cost from the original source but haven’t heard back yet.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: ChiBitCTy on September 17, 2022, 05:06:25 PMIt’s crazy to think Sterns show was the closest thing I could find to porn on regular cable TV as a young lad. I was in my early teens when I’d watch it back when his show was on the E channel. Crazy now as a grown man he’s still going.  I never got porn vibes from Howard Stern, but I was watching it in my late teens and later listening as a young adult so I was already well into girlfriend/wife territory.  If we're talking about questionable cable TV we watched as youngsters, I'd definitely have to go with USA's Up All Night.  I was too young when I watched that show to know why I liked it so much.  I just knew that I really enjoyed the movies they showed for some reason.  Now that I revisit it, I'm just now discovering that it wasn't Morgan Fairchild with Gilbert Gottfried.  I always thought it was.  So this doesn't get deleted by mods...Make sure to show us that shiny physical Beetcoin when you get your hands on it.

comments.author: ChiBitCTy
comments.body: Quote from: OgNasty on September 17, 2022, 07:37:54 PMQuote from: ChiBitCTy on September 17, 2022, 05:06:25 PMIt’s crazy to think Sterns show was the closest thing I could find to porn on regular cable TV as a young lad. I was in my early teens when I’d watch it back when his show was on the E channel. Crazy now as a grown man he’s still going.  I never got porn vibes from Howard Stern, but I was watching it in my late teens and later listening as a young adult so I was already well into girlfriend/wife territory.  If we're talking about questionable cable TV we watched as youngsters, I'd definitely have to go with USA's Up All Night.  I was too young when I watched that show to know why I liked it so much.  I just knew that I really enjoyed the movies they showed for some reason.  Now that I revisit it, I'm just now discovering that it wasn't Morgan Fairchild with Gilbert Gottfried.  I always thought it was.  So this doesn't get deleted by mods...Make sure to show us that shiny physical Beetcoin when you get your hands on it.  I was like 12/13 range when I first started watching Stern on E, and he always had porn stars and strippers and what not on the show, which I found better than the occasion boob you could catch when watching a scrambled soft core movie on Cinemax (skin-emax) lol.   I remember Up all Night as well lol. Ahh to be young in the 90s again. Will keep you posted on the Beetcoin.
